title: Enforce std.testing.allocator in all tests and add GPA to main.zig
body:
Audit all existing tests to ensure they use std.testing.allocator (or ArenaAllocator wrapping it). Add GeneralPurposeAllocator with .deinit() leak check to main.zig for debug builds.

**Deliverables:**
- Audit all test blocks across the codebase for allocator usage
- Fix any tests not using std.testing.allocator (audit shows none currently, but verify)
- Add GPA with .deinit() == .ok assertion to main.zig entry point (debug builds only)
- Ensure zig build test passes with zero leaks

**Design notes:**
- Current audit shows 100% compliance â€” all heap-allocating tests use std.testing.allocator
- main.zig should use GeneralPurposeAllocator in debug builds, with deinit check at exit
- This ensures leaks are caught both in tests AND during manual development runs
- ArenaAllocator wrapping std.testing.allocator is acceptable (the parent allocator still detects leaks)
